DataElement.preferredName: Fertile Patient Positive Urine Pregnancy Test Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to signify whether or not a fertile patient has a positive urine pregnancy test.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Fertile Patient Positive Urine Pregnancy Test
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Able to produce children._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Confirmation of something, such as a positive lab test. In medicine, a positive lab test indicates the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism. (NCI)_The fluid that is excreted by the kidneys.  It is stored in the bladder and discharged through the urethra._Any examination performed to assess if a female is gravid.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Able to produce children.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Confirmation of something, such as a positive lab test. In medicine, a positive lab test indicates the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism. (NCI):The fluid that is excreted by the kidneys.  It is stored in the bladder and discharged through the urethra.:Any examination performed to assess if a female is gravid.

Concepts.definition: Confirmation of something, such as a positive lab test. In medicine, a positive lab test indicates the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism. (NCI)
The fluid that is excreted by the kidneys.  It is stored in the bladder and discharged through the urethra.
Any examination performed to assess if a female is gravid.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patient of childbearing poten
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient of childbearing potential who has a positive (+) urine pregnancy test
